summary: This bill directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey approximately 310 acres of National Forest System land in Franklin County, Mississippi, to the Scenic Rivers Development Alliance. The conveyance is contingent on the Alliance submitting a written request and the Secretary determining it's in the public interest. The conveyance will be by quitclaim deed through a sale. The Alliance must pay fair market value, determined by appraisal or competitive sale, and cover appraisal and administrative costs. Proceeds go to the Sisk Act fund.
